alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 30 at 12:48PM CDT until October 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized amounts up to 5 inches possible on the southern edge of Lake of the Woods. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions for the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow bands can be compact in width, so there is a potential for wide variations in snow amounts over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Minnesota can be found at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami
